description.narrative: RAIN supports the Nepal WASH Alliance (NWA) by contributing to joint activities of the NWA and by contributing to the functioning of the NWA country coordinator.

Regular Coordination meeting 4-6 times a year Progress sharing seminar of NWA to sector stakeholders Meetings with governmental partners and other stakeholders, Workshop on social sustainability /communucation to develop GESI guideline
Capacity enhancement & alliance building ToT on WASH ( social trainer ) to field based staffs of partner organizations to be organized jointly ToT on WASH (technical)to field based technical staffs of partner organizations to be organized jointly Refresher training to LLB & other masons who can be up graded IEC materials & sani kit for mass awareness campaigns and trainers Contribution to sanitation campaigns & events on regional & national levels : World water day, World Toilet day,National sanitation week, world handwashing day Follow up visit of CC in project sites of NWA
Learning , knowledge Sharing & advocacy Review workshops of planning & reporting Participation & sharing in NECOSAN & SACOSAN Workshop on "Concept & Vision of NWA beyond 2015" Workshop PME

This is a financial contribution from RAIN Foundation to the proposal Joint Activities Costs carried out by Lumanti, with main contract holder WASTE as being the Country Lead organisation of the Dutch WASH Alliance programme in Nepal. WASTE will be responsible for all financial control, quality of the activities and time management. Revisions in the contract will be the main responsibility of WASTE and will be made in consultation with the responsible programme officer of the RAIN Foundation.
